author: Jessica
excerpt: We love watching the kentucky derby every May! Sharing tons of my favorite recipes for kentucky derby weekend, so break out the hats and pimento cheese and have a little get together!
text: We love watching the kentucky derby every May! Sharing tons of my favorite recipes for kentucky derby weekend below, so break out the hats and pimento cheese and have a little get together! I’m so excited to share a bunch of my favorite Kentucky Derby recipes in anticipation of the race next weekend! We love watching The Kentucky Derby and if you’ve been reading forever, then you know Eddie is a huge fan. It might just be his favorite day of the entire year. I love that we can make a few fun snacks at home and enjoy them for the entire minute or so when the race happens. Ha! No, but really, it’s a fun little micro-holiday (as I like to call them) that we get weirdly excited for and enjoy. And! If you have a copy of The Pretty Dish, then you know that I have a full derby day menu in there! Super fun with lots of snacks. I have lots of recipes here on the blog too, so I wanted to share in case you’re partaking in the celebration next Saturday, May 3. 30 Recipes for Kentucky Derby Weekend! Our Favorite Pimento Cheese Deviled Crab Dip Pimento Cheese Poppers with Jalapeño Ranch Melon Mosaic Salad Pimento Cheese Grilled Cheese with Spiralized Pickle Slaw Pimento Cheeseburgers 5 Ingredient Strawberry Rose Tart Triple Berry Crunch Salad Pimento Cheese Chicken Salad Biscuits BLT Pimento Cheese Flatbread Crispy Chicken Tacos with Gouda Pimento Cheese Pickled Shrimp Avocado Salad Pimento Cheese Brunch Grits Honey Mustard Cajun Shrimp and Grits Lemon Hot Honey Flatbread Pimento Cheese Chicken Quesadillas Hot Honey Bacon Wrapped Dates Chipotle BBQ Chicken with Creamed Corn Shrimp Salad Rolls Roasted Broccoli Pimento Cheddar Melts Strawberry Mango Mint Julep Fruit Salad Strawberry Shortcake Trifle Mango Avocado Shrimp Salsa Banana Cake with Espresso Frosting Gin and Tonic Cake Pimento Cheese Quiche Chocolate Poundcake with Bourbon Bacon Frosting Fresh Watermelon Mint Juleps Peach Vanilla Mint Juleps Strawberry Gin Lemonades Pimento Cheese Deviled Eggs
html:
We love watching the kentucky derby every May! Sharing tons of my favorite recipes for kentucky derby weekend below, so break out the hats and pimento cheese and have a little get together!

I’m so excited to share a bunch of my favorite Kentucky Derby recipes in anticipation of the race next weekend!

We love watching The Kentucky Derby and if you’ve been reading forever, then you know Eddie is a huge fan. It might just be his favorite day of the entire year.

I love that we can make a few fun snacks at home and enjoy them for the entire minute or so when the race happens. Ha! No, but really, it’s a fun little micro-holiday (as I like to call them) that we get weirdly excited for and enjoy.

And! If you have a copy of The Pretty Dish, then you know that I have a full derby day menu in there! Super fun with lots of snacks. I have lots of recipes here on the blog too, so I wanted to share in case you’re partaking in the celebration next Saturday, May 3.

30 Recipes for Kentucky Derby Weekend!

Our Favorite Pimento Cheese

Deviled Crab Dip

Pimento Cheese Poppers with Jalapeño Ranch

Pimento Cheese Grilled Cheese with Spiralized Pickle Slaw

Strawberry Gin Lemonades

Pimento Cheese Deviled Eggs
